news1.title: Accepted Paper at ICSE-SEET 2023
news1.description: Our paper titled 'Do the Test Smells Assertion Roulette and Eager Test Impact Students’ Troubleshooting and Debugging Capabilities?' has been accepted for presentation, exploring the effects of test smells on students' debugging skills.

news2.title: Accepted Paper at W4A’23
news2.description: Our paper titled 'The State of Accessibility in Blackboard: Survey and User Reviews Case Study' has been accepted.

news3.title: Accepted Paper at CHI 2024
news3.description: Our paper titled 'Empirical Investigation of Accessibility Bug Reports in Mobile Platforms: A Chromium Case Study' has been accepted for presentation.

location.name: Conference on Human Factors in Computing Systems (CHI)

news4.title: Accepted Papers at W4A’24
news4.description: Our five papers have been accepted at the 21st International Web for All Conference (W4A’24), 2024.

news5.title: Certification of Recognition
news5.description: Received the 2024 CSE Professional Faculty Teaching Award from the UNT Department of Computer Science and Engineering, honoring our commitment to excellence in teaching and mentoring.

location.name: UNT Department of Computer Science and Engineering

news6.title: Accessibility Challenge Judges' Award
news6.description: Awarded for the project 'Beyond Sight: Empowering Visually Impaired Users with Audible Graphs,' recognizing our innovative approach to enhancing accessibility for visually impaired users.

news7.title: Led TA Training Program at UNT
news7.description: I had the opportunity to lead our recent Teaching Assistantship (TA) Training program at the UNT Department of Computer Science & Engineering at the University of North Texas.

location.name: University of North Texas, Department of Computer Science & Engineering

news8.title: Research Presentation at UNT Open House
news8.description: I had the pleasure of presenting our research projects in HCI & Accessibility at the recent Open House at the University of North Texas UNT Department of Computer Science & Engineering.

location.name: University of North Texas, Department of Computer Science & Engineering

news9.title: Successful PhD Defense
news9.description: Dr. Asmaa Alghamdi successfully defended her PhD dissertation, marking a significant milestone as my first PhD student.

news10.title: Accepted Paper at Universal Access in the Information Society
news10.description: Our paper titled 'Understanding Developer Challenges and Trends in Web Accessibility: A Stack Overflow Analysis' has been accepted for presentation, contributing to the discourse on web accessibility challenges faced by developers.

location.name: Universal Access in the Information Society

news11.title: Accepted Papers at CDMA 2024
news11.description: Our two papers have been accepted for presentation, highlighting our research contributions in data science and machine learning.

location.name: 8th International Conference on Data Science and Machine Learning (CDMA)

news12.title: Three Accepted Papers at SIGCSE 2024
news12.description: Our three papers have been accepted for presentation, highlighting our research contributions in computer science education.

location.name: Technical Symposium on Computer Science Education (SIGCSE)

news13.title: Received the Best Paper Award at IHC 2024
news13.description: Our paper received the Best Paper Award for the work 'Strategic Insights into Integrating Accessibility in Software Development: Motivations, Barriers, Commitments, and Business Value'.

location.name: Brazilian Symposium on Human Factors in Computing Systems (IHC 2024)
